title: Can't create a discussion.
body: I'm already lvl 8 but I can create a discussion in the player requirement board. It say i must be lvl 7 or above

replies.body: Ahhhh sounds like somebody needed a quick boards profile sync! As it turns out, posting here in H&S will do the sync automatically, and it looks like it worked since you're showing up as level 8 now ^_^
